column5: Happy Birthday Shawn.  Hope it was great!
Happy B-day  Here is your dancer!!!

Happy Birthday Fishindevil!!!    Hope you have an awesome day!!  Did you get the boat all decked out this weekend?  Anyhow, hope to roam Lake O with you one of these days to hunt down some Salmon....until then, enjoy this fish cake!  Cliff and Carole
I probably should wait one minute...but HAPPY BIRTHDAY Shawn! Hope you get a chance to spend it in the boat...gonna be a beaut of a day Sunday.
have a great day Shawn go fishin or somethin.   Art

Wow, March sure is a popular month...this week very much so, the fifth Birthday this week that I know of....and I'm sure Beans would say you picked a fine day for it  Have a great day Shawn...  Maureen

Happy Birthday Man.....hope you enjoy your day to the fullest.....if you have time..take your boat for a ride...light winds on the lake today and the steelies are just schooled at the mouths of the easterly tribs.... Jason
Nahhhhhhhhhh I'd just hang with Fishergirl. Wherever.
Have the best birthday, Shawn!

Happy Birthday to you , Happy Birthday to you, Happy Birthday dear Shawn, Happy Birthday to you! (add the little emoticon with the music here, I can't find him... )   I hope you find many reasons to smile today!  Cheers Jen
Happy Birthday. Hope you have a great day.

And here's a little French Canadian Happy Birthday fer ya Bud!  <object width="425" height="350"><param name="movie" value="http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bopU0jHLm3Y"></param><param'>http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bopU0jHLm3Y"></param><param name="wmode" value="transparent"></param><embed src="http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bopU0jHLm3Y" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" wmode="transparent" width="425" height="350"></embed></object>  Be well.....
HAPPY BIRTHDAY BABY!!!!!!!!!!!   Angelina and I hope that you have a great day, and got everything that you wanted! You are the GREATEST daddy, better half and FISHERMAN!
First Julie, then you, well now, thats gotta be a great celebration time in short order. Especially on a weekend, lol. Have a great day Shaun.
ROY,  what the heck was that, lol???
Happy Birthday Shawn now get out there and take Julie in the new boat and catch lots of fish .MTP
Happy Birthday.........and what Roy said!
dude!~ happy bday and make it a good one!  cheers

thanks everyone....  for all the 40TH  happy-birthday wishes....its very nice to know that the people on this great fishing board genuinely care about other people.  ...thanks very much.....your friend     shawn a.k.a   FISHINDEVIL  And yes i did get the new boat out from storage yesterday and she is now ready to go....im so happy,thatand my family,are/is a great b-day presant....
Happy Birthday Fishdevil! "Go Team Three Go" FISH-CHASERS Nice looking fish cake there Cliff.
Oops, I mean Fishindevil.
WOW, there were some pretty busy parents in July.  Must have been the summers of love    with all these birthdays.  Have a great one Shawn.  HAPPY BIRTHDAY!!!!  Joey
HAPPY BIRTHDAY Shawn...   Julie must be up to something GoooooD  would'nt you think
Hope your day was a good one Shawn...Many happy returns...  This is a bit late but I was resting my eyes after dinner...LOL  :sleeping_02:
Happy birthday FD!!!!
Happy Bday!
Congrats!
